decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans- Site Plan, Location Plan, 18136_05_REV_C, 18136_04_REV_C, 18136_D&A_REV_B, 18136_03_REV_B, Arboricultural Impact Statement - EV Charging points dated 01/07/2019.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - Prior to the commencement of construction works on site, tree protection measures shall be installed in accordance with the Arboricultural Impact Statement - EV Charging points dated 01/07/2019 hereby approved. The protection shall then remain in place for the duration of works on site, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local authority.
 
Reason: To ensure that the development will not have an adverse effect on existing trees and in order to maintain the character and amenity of the area in accordance with the requirements of policies A2 and A3 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - The cabinet hereby approved shall be painted green within one month of being installed. 

Reason: In order to minimise the impact on the streetscene and local environment in accordance with the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Installation of 4 Electric Vehicle charging points and an associated meter cabinet for communal use
